changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE maintenance ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, idRequest INTEGER NOT NULL, idEmployee INTEGER NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, customerGuidelines VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, startDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, endDate TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (idRequest) REFERENCES maintenance_requests(idRequest), FOREIGN KEY (idEmployee) REFERENCES employee(idEmployee) );
